definitions.definition: An inhabitant or resident of Achaea , especially a member of an ancient Hellenic tribe that inhabited the region of Achaea.
In Homeric usage, a Greek person , especially of the Mycenaean era .

main_definition: An inhabitant or resident of Achaea , especially a member of an ancient Hellenic tribe that inhabited the region of Achaea.
secondary_definitions: ( loosely , literary ) In Homeric usage, a Greek person , especially of the Mycenaean era .
